name: podamShouldCreateInputStreamWithCustomTypeManufacturer

testSteps.description: Given a Podam Factory with an Input Stream Manufacturer

children.description: Given a Podam Factory with a Custom Type Manufacturer class java.io.InputStream

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.io.InputStream
Then the pojo java.io.ByteArrayInputStream@3384a5 must be of the type class java.io.InputStream
When I remove a type manufacturer for a type class java.io.InputStream
When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class java.io.InputStream
Then the object should be null

title: Podam should create InputStream with the custom type manufacturer
